name: The Magical World of Disney on PlayStation
overview: The Magical World of Disney on PlayStation is a Miscellaneous game, developed by Various and published by SCEE, which was released in Europe in 2002. Playable Demos: Aladdin in Nasira's Revenge Atlantis: The Lost Empire Lilo & Stitch: Trouble in Paradise Monsters Inc. Scare Island Peter Pan: Adventures in Never Land Tarzan The Jungle Book Groove Party Other: Lilo & Stitch official movie trailer
